We believe it has the potential to foster alternative perspectives, dialogue across difference, and an increased capacity for empathy. "It's time to get out of this tiny world."  Ying Jia  London School of Economics and Political Science   UK "Exchange life in Israel can be counted as one of the most wonderful memories in my life."  Tang Yingwei  Isreal Institure of Technology   Isreal ​"How brilliant the academic frontiers are."  Yang Wenyu  Harvard University   USA "Discover the charm of economy in historical process."  Huang Zixia  University of Cambridge   UK "Learn to treat everything with patience, gentleness and inclusiveness."  Li Lu  University of British Columbia   Canada "Walking on the roads in Japan was always like walking in comics and movies."  Gao Mengyu  Hokkaido University   Japan "This is undoubtedly a very good learning opportunity."  Feng Xiaotong  University of Lodz   Poland "The outside world is incredibly beautiful. Seize the opportunity to take a look at it."  Zhao Yongguan   Bologna University (UNIBO)   Italy "Enjoy life, enjoy work!"  Xi Yuejuan  University of Alberta   Canada "Through these experiences, I become a more independent person and I am not afraid of studying abroad any more. "  Li Minghan  NEOMA Business School   France  "I enjoyed the breeze in Itoshima and the volcano in Kumamoto Ken, which made my journey worth it. "  Zhang Shengli  Kyushu University   Japan "Life is a practice."  Yang Yalan  Taipei University   China "Time has wings and life is a moment."  Yang Peizhao  Tohoku University   Japan "If you don't go off to see the world, you will never know how exciting the world is!"  Yan Qi  Kyushu University   Japan "If you want to do something, just do it."  Ma Bocheng  Kyushu University   Japan
